entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView does not display group header when using the new handler CollectionViewHandler2 #25718
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.RoundRectangle has been Garbage Collected #25716
  • NU1100 & NU1103 396 erreurs je ne sais plus quoi faire #25714
  • [MAUI]The 'Pages' button text of G3 and G7 pages is black #25709
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [MAUI]When clicking on I8-View header and footer (Horizontal grid), the names and locations of some monkeys on the page were truncated. #25708
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #25707
  • XAML loader fails after new element added in project #25705
  • drawing text is not same as in winform with same font and font size? #25703

Closed

  • [testing] Some builds hang when running iOS samples or template tests #25695
  • .NET MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation bug #25669
  • vs 2022 with .net 9 #25704
  • [iOS] Remove new iOS18 Tabs from Catalyst and iPad #25136
    .NET 8 SR10
  • wrong version in latest release #25712
  • MAUI Geolocation from a known address #25698

PullRequests

Created

  • Setup lane to run CV2 and CV1 tests #25719
  • Flag #25717
  • Ensure that MeasureInvalidated properly propagates up #25715
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25711
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - improvements #25702
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, t/a11y
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs (#25137) #25700
    area-controls-tabbedpage

Merged

  • Try not run on arm64 #25701
  • Skip invalidation on propagation (#25652) #25696
    .NET 8 SR10
  • [Testing] Reenable test ported from Xamarin.UITest #25624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix minor online API docs warnings #25685
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix for the screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage #25690
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    community ✨
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
